universum.studios.android.ui.widget

Class ColorGraphicsInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.ui.widget.GraphicsInfo
      • universum.studios.android.ui.widget.ColorGraphicsInfo

  • public class ColorGraphicsInfo
extends GraphicsInfo
    A GraphicsInfo implementation that can be used for simple color drawing purpose.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky
    See Also:
    TextGraphicsInfo

                            ColorStateList colors,
                            @Nullable
                            int[] stateSet)
        Updates colors of this info to the specified one.
        Parameters:
        colors - The desired colors to update to.
        stateSet - State for which to pick actual color for paint.
        Returns:
        True if colors has been changed and paint updated, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        updatePaintColor(int[])

      • updatePaintColor

        public boolean updatePaintColor(@Nullable
                                int[] stateSet)
        Updates a color of this info's paint according to the specified stateSet from the actual colors hold by this info.
        Parameters:
        stateSet - The state set for which to pick the color.
        Returns:
        True if color within the paint has been changed, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        ColorStateList.getColorForState(int[], int)
